docs.lead_paragraph: Fresenius is considering pulling out of the bidding for French food group Danone's medical nutrition unit because of frustration with the slow progress of the process, two sources familiar with the situation said.

headline.main: Fresenius Set to Walk Away From Danone Unit-Sources
headline.print_headline: Fresenius Set to Walk Away From Danone Unit-Sources

docs.snippet: Fresenius is considering pulling out of the bidding for French food group Danone's medical nutrition unit because of frustration with the slow progress of the process, two sources familiar with the situation said.

docs.lead_paragraph: Billionaire hedge fund manager Chris Hohn has been ordered to pay his estranged wife Jamie Cooper-Hohn 337 million pounds ($530 million) in the largest divorce settlement in British legal history.

headline.main: Hedge Fund Couple Agree Britain's Most Expensive Divorce
headline.print_headline: Hedge Fund Couple Agree Britain's Most Expensive Divorce

docs.snippet: Billionaire hedge fund manager Chris Hohn has been ordered to pay his estranged wife Jamie Cooper-Hohn 337 million pounds ($530 million) in the largest divorce settlement in British legal history.

docs.lead_paragraph: As cranberry farmers bring in record harvests and berry prices plummet, the industry is trying to recast the fruit outside its usual Thanksgiving milieu.

headline.main: Cranberry Growers Search for Ways to Share Their Bounty
headline.print_headline: Cranberry Growers Search for Ways to Share Their Bounty

docs.abstract: Two years of record cranberry harvests in Wisconsin, which has nation's highest production of the fruit, have sent prices plummeting, and millions of pounds more than usual are in storage; with only a fifth of country's supply used between fall and winter, cranberry industry is trying to expand market beyond America's holiday season, and even beyond America itself.
docs.snippet: As cranberry farmers bring in record harvests and berry prices plummet, the industry is trying to recast the fruit outside its usual Thanksgiving milieu.

docs.lead_paragraph: New labels will help weight-conscious consumers and could improve public health.
docs.abstract: Editorial praises breadth of Food and Drug Administration's list of food items and establishments included in new regulations for posting calorie counts on menus and vending machines; maintains FDA's decisions on which retailers to include in final rules are reasonable burdens for establishments, and rightly prioritize protection of the American public in critical battle against obesity epidemic.
docs.snippet: New labels will help weight-conscious consumers and could improve public health.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

docs.lead_paragraph: Previous studies of the effect of posting calorie counts on menus reveal little or no change in behavior. But now there’s a really big sample size.

headline.main: Calories on Menus: Nationwide Experiment Into Human Behavior

docs.snippet: Previous studies of the effect of posting calorie counts on menus reveal little or no change in behavior. But now there’s a really big sample size.

docs.abstract: Before he lost his ability to speak, one of my son’s favorite questions was, “Mommy, what are you thankful for?” Over the Thanksgiving we spent in the intensive care unit, I continued to answer the question he could no longer ask.
docs.snippet: Before he lost his ability to speak, one of my son’s favorite questions was, “Mommy, what are you thankful for?” Over the Thanksgiving we spent in the intensive care unit, I continued to answer the question he could no longer ask.

docs.lead_paragraph: Danone, the world's largest yogurt maker, is weighing a sale of its 20 percent stake in Japan's Yakult Honsha, worth about $2 billion (1.26 billion pounds), Bloomberg reported on Wednesday.

headline.main: Danone Weighing Sale of $2 Billion Yakult Stake-Bloomberg
headline.print_headline: Danone Weighing Sale of $2 Billion Yakult Stake-Bloomberg

docs.snippet: Danone, the world's largest yogurt maker, is weighing a sale of its 20 percent stake in Japan's Yakult Honsha, worth about $2 billion (1.26 billion pounds), Bloomberg reported on Wednesday.

docs.lead_paragraph: Prosecutors said Tuesday they can no longer support a homicide charge against a special-education teacher who had been accused of killing her severely disabled daughter by neglecting her.

headline.main: No Homicide Charge Against NY Mom in Girl's Death
headline.print_headline: No Homicide Charge Against NY Mom in Girl's Death

docs.snippet: Prosecutors said Tuesday they can no longer support a homicide charge against a special-education teacher who had been accused of killing her severely disabled daughter by neglecting her.

docs.lead_paragraph: Diners will soon know how many calories are in that bacon cheeseburger at a chain restaurant, the pasta salad in the supermarket salad bar and even that buttery tub of popcorn at the movie theater.

headline.main: Calorie Count to Appear With Many Prepared Foods
headline.print_headline: Calorie Count to Appear With Many Prepared Foods

docs.snippet: Diners will soon know how many calories are in that bacon cheeseburger at a chain restaurant, the pasta salad in the supermarket salad bar and even that buttery tub of popcorn at the movie theater.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Food and Drug Administration announced a sweeping rule that will require chain restaurants and movie theaters to post calorie counts on their menus.

headline.main: F.D.A. to Require Calorie Count, Even for Popcorn at the Movies
headline.print_headline: U.S. to Require Calorie Count, Even at Movies

docs.abstract: Food and Drug Administration is set to release new regulations to require chain restaurants, movie theaters and pizza parlors to post calorie counts on their menus; rules are effort to address nation's obesity epidemic and will have broad implications for public health.
docs.snippet: The Food and Drug Administration announced a sweeping rule that will require chain restaurants and movie theaters to post calorie counts on their menus.
